name: Crochet Cotton Exfoliating Facial Scrubbie Cloths - Set of Seven
description:
This is a set of seven 100% cotton crochet facial scrubbie cloths. The facial scrubbie cloths each measure approximately 3 ¼” x 3 ¼”. The gentle exfoliating texture is great for the face. These hand crocheted facial scrubbie cloths are strong, absorbent, and very durable. They can be used again and again – just throw them in the washer. Once you have used a handmade facial scrubbie cloth, you won’t want anything else. You won’t believe how clean your face will feel! Use them with your favorite soaps, cleansers and toners. Quit wasting your money on disposable makeup remover pads and cotton balls.

These facial scrubbie cloths are white.

This item is ready to be shipped. I ship ready made items within 24 hours of cleared payment. If you don't see a color you are looking for, email me and I will see what I can do for you. 

Shipping is USPS 1st class mail. If you would like your purchase delivered sooner through priority mail, please email me and wait for an adjusted invoice. If you have any questions please email me.

name: Crochet Cotton Dishcloth - Mystery Color
description:
You will receive one of my Handmade Cotton Crochet Dishcloths. These hand crocheted dishcloths are strong, absorbent, and very durable. Once you have used a handmade dish cloth, you won’t want anything else. The knobby texture is great for scrubbing your pots. 

DETAILS: These are hand crocheted dishcloths. The dishcloths measure approximately 7” square. They are made of very absorbent 100% cotton 4ply worsted yarn.

COLORS: It's a MYSTERY!! You could receive any one of the dishcloths pictured above. If you really have a preference, let me know and I will try to accomodate you.

PRICE: $ 4.00 for each dishcloth. Shipping is $1.75.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: They are machine washable and dryer safe.

WHEN WILL IT SHIP: This item is ready to be shipped. I ship ready made items within 24 hours of cleared payment.

CUSTOM ORDERS ARE GREAT! If you don't see a color you are looking for, email me and I will see what I can do for you. 

SHIPPING: Shipping is USPS 1st class mail. If you would like your purchase delivered sooner through priority mail, please email me and wait for an adjusted invoice.
